sn14.17:1.2: “Mendicants, sentient beings join together and converge because of an element:
sn14.17:1.9: and the witless with the witless.
sn14.17:2.1: In the past, too, sentient beings came together and converged because of an element. …
sn14.17:3.1: In the future, too, sentient beings will join together and converge because of an element. …
sn14.17:4.1: At present, too, sentient beings join together and converge because of an element. …
sn14.17:5.1: Sentient beings join together and converge because of an element:
sn14.17:5.8: and the wise with the wise.
sn14.17:5.11: At present, too, sentient beings join together and converge because of an element. …”
